channel.title: Changing hitpoints bar
channel.description: How do I change the hitpoints bar back to the normal Runescape one. Currently it is green with a metalic finish and says hp at the left end. How would I go about changing it back to the normal Runescape bar? Thanks

item.title: Changing hitpoints bar
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

I have the same one, I’m not 100% sure, but I’m pretty sure you need to add a model to your models folder to overwrite the current one

Read full topic
